印象里楼主是不是最喜欢Amy Klobuchar?  ;)

This is a historic moment. And America must seize on the moment and I truly believe — as I actually told the VP last night when I called him — that I think this is a moment to put a woman of color on that ticket. And there are so many incredible, qualified women.

If you wanna heal this nation right now, my party yes, but our nation, this is a helluva way to do it.



Klobuchar withdraws from veepstakes, says Biden should pick woman of color

https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/2020-election/klobuchar-withdraws-veepstakes-says-biden-should-pick-woman-color-n1231501

哎，理想国度里当然是希望能够多一些Amy这样温柔又睿智的政客。
